Ice_Bolt.display_help: Ice Bolt quickly pelts an enemy with small icy daggers; their chill Slows a foe's attacks and movement for a time. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Ice_Bolt.display_target_help: Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Ice Bolt.

Ice_Sword.display_help: You create a blade of solid ice that deals good damage. Being hit by this Ice Sword will Slow a target's movement and attack speed, due to the intense chill. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Ice_Sword.display_target_help: You are chilled. Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Ice_Sword_Circle.display_help: Mastery of your Ice Sword has enabled you to make an attack on every foe within melee distance. This will slash and chill your enemies, dealing moderate damage and slowing all affected targets' movement and attack speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Ice_Sword_Circle.display_target_help: You are chilled. Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Ice_Blast.display_help: Ice Blast hurls shards of ice at foes and Slows their attacks and movement for a time. Slower recharge than Ice Bolt, but more damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Ice_Blast.display_target_help: Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Ice Blast.

Power_Boost.display_help: Boosts the damage and secondary effects of your powers. Your powers' effects like Heals, Defense Buffs, Endurance Drains, Disorients, Holds, Immobilizes and more, are all improved. The effects of Power Up last a short while, and only the next couple of attacks will be boosted. Recharge: Long

messages.display_attacker_hit: You build up your power to enhance the secondary effects and damage of your powers moderately.

Frost_Breath.display_help: Unleashes a cone of frosty breath that can Slow your opponents' movement and attacks. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Frost_Breath.display_target_help: You are freezing. Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Frost Breath.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage over time.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage over time.

Chilling_Embrace.display_help: While active, you dramatically lower the temperature around yourself, Slowing the attack rate of all nearby foes, as well as their damage and movement speed. The low air temperatures may also deal some damage over time to the snared foes. Recharge: Very Fast
Chilling_Embrace.display_target_help: Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced by the Chilling Embrace.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

Greater_Ice_Sword.display_help: Ice Slash allows the user to create a blade of solid ice and strike a foe for high damage. Being hit by Ice Slash will Slow a foes' attack and movement speed, due to the intense chill. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Greater_Ice_Sword.display_target_help: You are chilled. Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Bitter_Ice_Blast.display_help: A slower yet more powerful version of Ice Blast, Bitter Ice Blast deals much more damage and can also reduce your enemy's chance to hit. Like other Ice Blast powers, Bitter Ice Blast can Slow a target's movement and attack speed. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Bitter_Ice_Blast.display_target_help: Your chance to hit, Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Bitter Ice Bolt.
